title: Charming 3Bed2Bath! Pet Friendly, W/D In Unit, Extended Closet!
posting_body: ['Welcome to The Knolls at Inglewood Hill', 'The Knolls at Inglewood Hill is more than just a home-', "it's a lifestyle.", 'From our lush landscape and designer-inspired interiors, to the clear blue waters of Lake Sammamish, we have thoughtfully crafted every element of our community to provide our residents with the quality of life that we would want for ourselves.', 'Offering one, two, and three bedroom modern apartments for rent, The Knolls at Inglewood Hill is sure to have a layout that works best with your life.', 'Nestled among the lushness of evergreens, free from the noise of the freeway, there sits a place where modern amenities meet the timeless appeal of nature.', 'That place is home.', 'That place is The Knolls at Inglewood Hill.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Need more information?', 'Copy this link:', '<URL>', 'This is a 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1107 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- 1-12 Month Leasing Options', '- Energy-Efficient Appliances', '- Washers & Dryers', '- Private Storage on Balcony', '- Custom Cabinetry', '- Walk-in Closets', '- Solid-Surface Countertops', '- Stainless-Steel Appliances', '- Pet Friendly', '- Stunning Views*', '- Dishwasher & Microwave', '*In Select Homes', 'Community Amenities', '- Fitness Center', '- Close to Parks with Off-Leash Areas', '- Online Rental Payments', '- Emergency Maintenance', '- Clubhouse', '- Access to Trails', '- Onsite Dog Park', '- Movie Theater', '- Parcel Pending Package Delivery Service', '- Recycling Center', '- Garages Available', '- Pet-Friendly', '- Carport Parking', '- Playground', '- Onsite Management', '- Resort-Style Swimming Pool', '- Walkable Distance to Lake Sammamish', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet friendly, fees and restrictions apply.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday 9am to 6pm', 'Saturday 10am to 5pm', 'Sunday-Closed', 'Knolls at Inglewood Hill', '22626 NE Inglewood Hill Road, Sammamish, WA, 98074', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'G19SJFAjaj']
